words.source: H2005 interj. hinneh 'behold' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H4305 Hiphil ptc. ms of מָטַר 'to rain'; KJV 'I will cause it to rain', ESV 'I will cause very heavy hail to fall', NASB 'I am going to send'
H6256 prep. k- + art. + n.fs ʿet 'time'; KJV 'about this time', ESV 'about this time', NASB 'about this time'
H4279 n.ms machar 'tomorrow'; KJV 'to morrow', ESV 'tomorrow', NASB 'tomorrow'
H1259 n.ms barad 'hail'; KJV 'hail', ESV 'hail', NASB 'hail'
H3515 adj.ms kaved 'heavy, severe'; KJV 'grievous', ESV 'heavy', NASB 'severe'
H3966 adv. meʾod 'very, exceedingly'; KJV 'very', ESV 'very', NASB 'very'
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'such as', ESV 'such as', NASB 'such as'
H3808 neg. part. loʾ 'not'; KJV 'hath not been', ESV 'never has been', NASB 'has not been'
H1961 Qal perf. 3ms of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'been', ESV 'been', NASB 'been'
H3644 prep. k- + 3ms suff. kamohu 'like it'; KJV 'the like', ESV 'the like', NASB 'its equal'
H4714 prep. b- + proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt'; KJV 'in Egypt', ESV 'in Egypt', NASB 'in Egypt'
H4480 prep. l- + prep. min 'from'; KJV 'since', ESV 'from', NASB 'from'
H3117 art. + n.ms yom 'day'; KJV 'the day', ESV 'the day', NASB 'the day'
H3245 Niphal inf. constr. + 3fs suff. of יָסַד 'to found, establish'; KJV 'it was founded', ESV 'it was founded', NASB 'it was founded'
H5704 waw + prep. ʿad 'until, up to'; KJV 'until', ESV 'until', NASB 'until'
H6258 adv. ʿattah 'now'; KJV 'now', ESV 'now', NASB 'now'
